feature_model.name: Engine
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Engine (f_Engine) :m automotive system (f_automotive_system) :m Chassis (f_Chassis) :m wiper (f_wiper) :m Front Wiper (f_Front_Wiper) :m Energy Reservoir (f_Energy_Reservoir) :m GearBox (f_GearBox) :o Rear Wiper (f_Rear_Wiper) :o 4x4 Drive GearBox (f_4x4_Drive_GearBox) :o AC (f_AC) :g [1, 1] : Climate Control (f_Climate_Control) : Manual Control (f_Manual_Control) :g [1, *] : Accumulator (f_Accumulator) : Gasoline Tank (f_Gasoline_Tank) :g [1, 1] : 8-Cylinder Engine (f_8_Cylinder_Engine) : 4-Cylinder Engine (f_4_Cylinder_Engine) : 6-Cylinder Engine (f_6_Cylinder_Engine) :g [1, 1] : Front Interval Wipe (f_Front_Interval_Wipe) : Rain Sensor (f_Rain_Sensor) :m Front Rain Sensor Wipe (f_Front_Rain_Sensor_Wipe) :g [1, 1] : Automatic GearBox (f_Automatic_GearBox) : Manual Gearbox (f_Manual_Gearbox) :g [1, 1] : Roof Control (f_Roof_Control) :m Cabrio Chassis (f_Cabrio_Chassis) :g [1, 1] : Roof Control with Rain Sensor (f_Roof_Control_with_Rain_Sensor) : Manual Roof Control (f_Manual_Roof_Control) : Station Wagon Chassis (f_Station_Wagon_Chassis) :g [1, 1] : Electiric Engine (f_Electiric_Engine) : Diesel Engine (f_Diesel_Engine) : Hybrid Engine (f_Hybrid_Engine) : Gasoline Engine (f_Gasoline_Engine)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_8_Cylinder_Engine or f_Automatic_GearBox constraint_2:~f_Gasoline_Engine or f_Gasoline_Tank constraint_3:~f_Diesel_Engine or f_Gasoline_Tank constraint_4:~f_Station_Wagon_Chassis or f_Rear_Wiper constraint_5:~f_Electiric_Engine or f_Accumulator constraint_6:~f_4_Cylinder_Engine or f_Manual_Gearbox constraint_7:~f_Roof_Control_with_Rain_Sensor or f_Rain_Sensor constraint_8:~f_Roof_Control_with_Rain_Sensor or f_Engine constraint_9:~f_Hybrid_Engine or f_Gasoline_Tank constraint_10:~f_Hybrid_Engine or f_Accumulator
